thread.title: Michelle Obama: Failure and rejection are a part of success
thread.title_full: Michelle Obama: Failure and rejection are a part of success

title: Michelle Obama: Failure and rejection are a part of success
text:
Updated: 1:46 p.m. Wednesday, Oct. 14, 2015 | Posted: 1:46 p.m. Wednesday, Oct. 14, 2015 Michelle Obama: Failure and rejection are a part of success Sponsored Links The Associated Press WASHINGTON â€” 
Michelle Obama is telling students that failure and rejection are part of the process to achieving success. 
The first lady told youngsters that with a lot of hard work they will learn to pick themselves up and become more resilient. 
Mrs. Obama welcomed local students to the White House Wednesday as she hosted a music workshop with Smokey Robinson, Esperanza Spalding, MC Lyte, Trombone Shorty and Keb' Mo'. Students learned to rhyme, produce and write songs during the workshop titled "A Celebration of Song." 
The entertainers will perform during an evening concert as part of the "In Performance at the White House" series. The program is celebrating the 50th anniversary of the National Foundation on the Arts and the Humanities Act.
